text: Eti lyudi (o Mukhammad!) byli tvoimi vragami i ne slushali tebya, nastoychivo vystupaya protiv tebya, a ty khotel vesti ikh k pryamomu puti. I tak My ustanovili dlya kazhdogo proroka, peredayushchego Nashe Poslaniye, surovykh vragov, - samykh zlovrednykh iz chisla lyudey i iz chisla dzhinnov, - skrytykh ot tebya, kotoryye vnushayut drug drugu prelestnyye, no fal'shivyye slova dlya soblazna i lozhnogo obol'shcheniya. Tak zakhotel Allakh. A yesli by On pozhelal, oni by tak ne postupali. No eto - dlya togo, chtoby ochistit' serdtsa veruyushchikh i chtoby istina stala yavnoy. Ostav' zhe neveruyushchikh v ikh zabluzhdenii i s tem, chto oni lozhno izmyshlyayut
